hadiths.text: ‘Umair, the freed slave of Aabi Lahm – Waki’ said; - “He used to not eat meat” – said:“I fought alongside my master on the Day of Khaibar, and I was a slave. I was not given anything from the spoils of war but I was given from the least of the utensils (goods) a sword, which I dragged when I put it around my waist.”

chapter.ara-name: باب الْعَبِيدِ وَالنِّسَاءِ يَشْهَدُونَ مَعَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
chapter.eng-name: Slaves and woman accompanying the Muslims (in battle)
